title: Bug 23419[OLE] Do not get scrollbars in Excel
description: Bug 23419[OLE] Do not get scrollbars in Excel
OB: You do not get the scrollbars in an embedded Excel editor.
SR: You do for Word.STEPS1) Copy headingtext.xls from the attachment to this PR2) Open it in an OLEEditor3) Resize to get it to show up properly and select Sheet24) There will be no scrollbars even though there is data you need to scroll to
